mapper.select: SELECT A.BACKUP_RESULT_ID , A.BACKUP_OPERT_ID , B.BACKUP_OPERT_NM , A.BACKUP_FILE , B.BACKUP_ORGINL_DRCTRY , B.BACKUP_STRE_DRCTRY , A.STTUS , C.CODE_NM AS "sttusNm" , A.ERROR_INFO , A.EXECUT_BEGIN_TM AS "executBeginTime" , A.EXECUT_END_TM AS "executEndTime" , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM AS "lastUpdusrPnttm" , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm" FROM COMTN_BACKUP_RESULT A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_BACKUP_OPERT B ON A.BACKUP_OPERT_ID = B.BACKUP_OPERT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM076') C ON A.STTUS = C.CODE WHERE A.BACKUP_RESULT_ID = #{backupResultId}
